name: Next Kraftwerke Belgium BVBA
goal:
Next Kraftwerke is the operator and provider of a large-scale Virtual Power Plant (VPP) and a certified power trader on various European energy exchanges. The concept of the Virtual Power Plant Next Pool is based on the idea to network medium- and small-scale power producing and power consuming units. The objective is to smartly distribute supply and demand and to profitably trade the generated and consumed power.

With its services Next Kraftwerke follows the goal to make a system based on 100% renewables possible.
interests: Competition, Energy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Next Kraftwerke observces all initiatives, strategies and legal actions in relation with the energy market in Europe. Examples are among others
- Grid codes (and framework guidelines)
- RES directive
- Energy efficiency directive
